SEARCH
Package Game.Entitys

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Game.Entitys.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Entity
public class Player extends Object implements Entity
The player class represents a player in the game. The class implements the Entity interface and provides methods to damage the player's state, interact with targets, and use items.
Author:
Tânia Morais, Tomás Neto

    • calculateHealth

      public int calculateHealth(int OpositePower) throws InvalidElementException
      Calculates the remaining health of the player after taking damage based on the opposing power.
      Specified by:
      calculateHealth in interface Entity
      Parameters:
      OpositePower - the opposing entity's attack power
      Returns:
      the remaining health of the player
      Throws:
      InvalidElementException - if the opposing power is less than or equals to zero

      User a recovery item from the backpack to resource health.
      Throws:
      EmptyCollectionException - if the backpack is empty and there are no recovery items available.
